du.boss: du displays disk usage information for files and directories.
du.sysadmin: Disk usage analyzer showing space consumption with various output formats.
du.use_case: Analyzing disk space usage, finding large files, and storage management.

df.eli5: A command that shows how much free space is available on your hard drives.
df.boss: df displays filesystem disk space usage and availability.
df.sysadmin: Filesystem space analyzer showing mounted volumes and available space.
df.use_case: Monitoring filesystem capacity, checking available space, and storage planning.

lsblk.eli5: A command that shows all the storage devices and partitions connected to your computer.
lsblk.boss: lsblk displays block devices and their relationships in a tree format.
lsblk.sysadmin: Block device lister showing device hierarchy, mount points, and filesystem information.
lsblk.use_case: Viewing storage device layout, partition information, and mount relationships.

mount.eli5: A command that makes storage devices and network shares accessible to your computer.
mount.boss: mount attaches filesystems to the directory tree for access.
mount.sysadmin: Filesystem mounting utility for attaching storage devices and network shares.
mount.use_case: Mounting USB drives, network shares, and additional storage devices.

lsof.eli5: A tool that shows which files and network connections are currently being used by programs.
lsof.boss: lsof lists open files and network connections by processes.
lsof.sysadmin: List open files utility showing file descriptors, network connections, and process relationships.
lsof.use_case: Troubleshooting file locks, network connections, and process debugging.

netstat.eli5: A command that shows all the network connections and listening ports on your computer.
netstat.boss: netstat displays network connections, routing tables, and interface statistics.
netstat.sysadmin: Network statistics tool showing active connections, listening ports, and routing information.
netstat.use_case: Network troubleshooting, port monitoring, and connection analysis.

ss.eli5: A modern replacement for netstat that shows network connections and socket information.
ss.boss: ss displays socket statistics and network connection information.
ss.sysadmin: Socket statistics utility providing detailed network connection and socket information.
ss.use_case: Network connection monitoring, socket analysis, and performance troubleshooting.

nmap.eli5: A network scanner that can discover devices and check what services they're running.
nmap.boss: nmap performs network discovery and security auditing through port scanning.
nmap.sysadmin: Network mapper for host discovery, port scanning, and service detection.
nmap.use_case: Network discovery, security auditing, and service enumeration.

tcpdump.eli5: A network packet sniffer that captures and analyzes network traffic for troubleshooting.
tcpdump.boss: tcpdump captures and analyzes network packets for debugging and monitoring.
tcpdump.sysadmin: Command-line packet analyzer for network traffic capture and protocol analysis.
tcpdump.use_case: Network troubleshooting, protocol analysis, and security investigation.

wireshark.eli5: A graphical network analyzer that shows network traffic in an easy-to-understand interface.
wireshark.boss: Wireshark provides comprehensive network protocol analysis with a GUI interface.
wireshark.sysadmin: Graphical network protocol analyzer with deep packet inspection and filtering.
wireshark.use_case: Network troubleshooting, protocol analysis, and security forensics.

ping.eli5: A simple network test that checks if another computer is reachable and how fast the connection is.
ping.boss: ping tests network connectivity and measures round-trip time to hosts.
ping.sysadmin: ICMP echo utility for testing network connectivity and measuring latency.
ping.use_case: Basic connectivity testing, latency measurement, and network troubleshooting.

traceroute.eli5: A tool that shows the path your internet traffic takes to reach another computer.
traceroute.boss: traceroute displays the network path and hop-by-hop latency to a destination.
traceroute.sysadmin: Network diagnostic tool showing routing path and per-hop latency measurements.
traceroute.use_case: Network path analysis, routing troubleshooting, and latency diagnosis.

mtr.eli5: A combination of ping and traceroute that continuously shows the network path and quality.
mtr.boss: mtr combines ping and traceroute functionality for continuous network monitoring.
mtr.sysadmin: Network diagnostic tool providing continuous traceroute with packet loss statistics.
mtr.use_case: Continuous network monitoring, intermittent connectivity issues, and path quality analysis.
